Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can illustrate a scenario where two people need to communicate over a long distance, such as a playground or park.
The student can accurately draw a string telephone, showing two cups connected by a string.
The student can clearly depict the string connecting the two cups, emphasizing the physical connection as essential for communication.
The student can demonstrate the function of the string telephone by including directional lines or arrows that indicate sound waves traveling from one cup to the other.
The student can correctly use the designated materials (cups and string) in their drawing.
The student can include a concise explanation of how the string telephone enables communication over a distance, mentioning vibrations traveling through the string.
CANNOT: The student may not include additional decorative elements or unrelated materials in the drawing, as the focus is on the function rather than aesthetics.
